articles.content:
Plex has unveiled a new component to its streaming software called Plex Arcade that adds game-streaming to its movie and music streaming capabilities. 
The service, which is still in beta, will cost… [+1923 chars]

articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: iPhone 13 Models Again Rumored to Support Faster Wi-Fi 6E - MacRumors
articles.description:
Apple plans to release its first iPhones with Wi-Fi 6E support in 2021, according to Barclays analysts Blayne Curtis and Thomas O'Malley.

articles.content:
Apple plans to release its first iPhones with Wi-Fi 6E support in 2021, according to Barclays analysts Blayne Curtis and Thomas O'Malley.
